title: What will the world be like 10 years, 20 years, and 50 years from now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ten years from now… more electric cars, auto drive Less marriages in Western world and Asia.. Others may marry but have less or no children because of inflation Pollution will be a major threat. All countries will try reducing pollution, plant more trees. Man will change ice on Mars to water using solar energy People will eat out more and cook lesser at home. It saves time and energy. All will eat out, all their meals. _ _ _ _ Twenty years from now Only online studying, online exams, no real class rooms or teachers Bullet trains, three tier roads criss crossing all the cities. Apartments will no more have a room called kitchen or dining. Only hall with bedrooms and a shelf as kitchenette. Many govt and privately run orphanages for children and old parents abandoned by parents and children. It will a flourishing business. Govt health care will become excellent. Taxes will increase as a consequence Many countries will have new well planned, capital cities. Old capitals will become an antique for sight seeing only. World population will touch a max of 9 by now _ _ _ Fifty years from now No marriages, less live ins, same sex live ins common. Lesser children will be born Land prices will soar. World population will start declining, many countries will see negative growths. It will go down from 10 billion, it will go backwards to … 9, 8…to 7 finally Everything will be online, money will be a piece of paper of no value. It has value only online, as numbers in transactions and in banks Human Colony on Moon and Mars, with veg, fruits, cereals being produced in controlled conditions. Rich will travel to Mars and Moon on Thomas Cook travel packages.
